## LaTeX Mathematical Symbols

R markdown and Quarto support LaTeX mathematical expressions. 

If you are not familiar with LaTeX, you can find the list of basic LaTeX commands and example codes to write mathematical equations in the following document. 

{{< fa file >}} [Latex math notations and Example R codes with PDF output](https://shunkei3.github.io/R-slides/z_doc/Demonstration.pdf){target="_blank"}

Especially, Sections 1 and 2 might be helpful for students unfamiliar with LaTeX math expressions. These are the most commonly used LATEX commands when you write assignments for econometrics and microeconomics classes in APEC!
